name: @standalone/paima-engine
description: Paima Engine standalone, aka executable binary wrapper around the engine core.

scripts.build:binary: npm run build && npx pkg packaged/engineCorePacked.js --options "experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
scripts.build:dev-binary-macos: echo "To rebuild clean $HOME/.pkg-cache" && npm run build && npx pkg-dev packaged/engineCorePacked.js --debug -t node18-macos-x64 -b --options "inspect,experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
scripts.build:dev-binary-linux: echo "To rebuild clean $HOME/.pkg-cache" && npm run build && npx pkg-dev packaged/engineCorePacked.js --debug -t node18-linux -b --options "inspect,experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
